It includes input fields for name, gender, and eye color within an 'N.form' section, and a table element for data display within an 'N.grid' section. A search button is also provided to trigger data retrieval.","codeLanguage":"html","codeTokens":401,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-TEMPLATE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Search Form + Grid Example","codeList":[{"language":"html","code":"

"}]},{"codeTitle":"HTML Structure for Data List Retrieval with Natural-JS","codeDescription":"This HTML defines the structure for a search box (N.form) and a data grid (N.grid) to retrieve a data list. The search box includes input fields for name, gender, and eye color, along with a search button. The table structure is prepared for displaying a list of data with columns for index, name, email, gender, eye color, age, company, and active status.","codeLanguage":"HTML","codeTokens":132,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Natural-JS Example Guide","codeList":[{"language":"HTML","code":"

Index Name Email Gender Eye Color Age Company Active
"]},{"codeTitle":"Defining HTML Structure for Search and Data Grid","codeDescription":"This HTML snippet outlines the foundational structure for a web page component, including a search box with interactive buttons (Add, Delete, Save, Search) and a detailed data grid. The grid features a header with multi-row and multi-column spans, a 'Check All' checkbox, and data-filter attributes for specific columns, indicating potential client-side filtering.","codeLanguage":"HTML","codeTokens":487,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Natural-JS Example Guide","codeList":[{"language":"HTML","code":"

Name Email Gender Eye Color Age Registered Active
About Greeting
"}]},{"codeTitle":"Creating the Main Index Page (HTML)","codeDescription":"This HTML file serves as the main entry point for the Natural-JS single-page application. It includes necessary Natural-JS libraries, defines the layout using CSS, and initializes the `N.docs` component for managing MDI pages. It uses jQuery for DOM readiness and `N().comm()` to load the left menu.","codeLanguage":"HTML","codeTokens":438,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-GETTINGSTARTED.md","pageTitle":"Natural-JS Getting Started Guide","codeList":[{"language":"HTML","code":" Natural-JS
"}]},{"codeTitle":"HTML Structure for Retrieving Form Data","codeDescription":"This HTML snippet defines the structure for a form used to display retrieved data. It includes fields for 'picture', 'name', 'email', and 'password', with specific styling and data formatting attributes.","codeLanguage":"html","codeTokens":282,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Natural-JS Example Guide","codeList":[{"language":"html","code":"
picture Name
Email
Password
"}]},{"codeTitle":"Structuring Natural-JS Page Blocks with View and Controller","codeDescription":"This HTML snippet illustrates the recommended structure for Natural-JS page blocks, separating the View (HTML) and Controller (JavaScript) areas. It shows how to define a block with an ID and a corresponding `N().cont()` controller object, including an `init` function that uses `N.comm` to fetch data and update the view, demonstrating a basic client-server interaction.","codeLanguage":"HTML","codeTokens":189,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-GETTINGSTARTED.md","pageTitle":"Natural-JS Getting Started Guide","codeList":[{"language":"HTML","code":"
"}]},{"codeTitle":"Natural.js Controller for Search, Grid, and Paging","codeDescription":"This JavaScript controller initializes and manages the N.form, N.grid, and N.pagination components. It defines component options, handles data communication for fetching paginated lists, and sets up event handlers for search actions and filter changes, ensuring server-side data binding and page navigation.","codeLanguage":"javascript","codeTokens":617,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-TEMPLATE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Search Form + Grid Example","codeList":[{"language":"javascript","code":"const cont = N('.type0301').cont({ // Component initialization and options 'p.select.gender': [ 'gender' ], 'p.select.eyeColor': [ 'eyeColor' ], 'p.form.search': { usage: 'search-box' }, 'p.grid.master': { resizable: true, filter: false, fixedcol: 3, checkAll: '#checkAll', checkAllTarget: '.checkAllTarget', createRowDelay: 0 }, 'p.pagination.masterPagination': { blockOnChangeWhenBind: true, countPerPage: 15, onChange: (pageNo, selEle, selData, currPageNavInfo) => { cont['c.getSampleList']().submit((data) => { let totalCount = 0; if (Array.isArray(data) && data[0] && data[0].totalCount) { totalCount = data[0].totalCount; } cont['p.pagination.masterPagination'].bind(totalCount); cont['p.grid.master'].bind(data); }); } }, // Data communication 'c.getSampleList': () => N(Object.assign(cont['p.form.search'].data()[0], cont['p.pagination.masterPagination'].currPageNavInfo())).comm('sample/getSamplePaginationList.json'), // Event handler 'e.btnSearch.click': (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (cont['p.form.search'].validate()) { cont['p.pagination.masterPagination'].pageNo(1).bind(); cont['c.getSampleList']().submit((data) => { let totalCount = 0; if (Array.isArray(data) && data[0] && data[0].totalCount) { totalCount = data[0].totalCount; } cont['p.pagination.masterPagination'].bind(totalCount); cont['p.grid.master'].bind(data); }); } }, // Other event handlers 'e.gender.change': { target: '#search #gender', handler: (e) => { cont['e.btnSearch.click'].trigger('click'); } }, 'e.eyeColor.change': { target: '#search #eyeColor', handler: (e) => { cont['e.btnSearch.click'].trigger('click'); } }, // Initialization init: (view, request) => { if (cont.opener) { // Logic for parent page } else { cont['e.btnSearch.click'].trigger('click'); } } });"}]},{"codeTitle":"Defining User Interface Layout with HTML","codeDescription":"This HTML snippet defines the core layout for a data management interface. It includes a 'searchBox' div containing action buttons for Add, Delete, Save, and Search operations. Below this, a 'grid' table is defined with a header row that supports data filtering and a sample body row showcasing various input types (text, select, checkbox) along with 'data-validate' and 'data-format' attributes for client-side validation and formatting.","codeLanguage":"html","codeTokens":686,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Natural-JS Example Guide","codeList":[{"language":"html","code":"
  • Add Delete Save Search
Name Email Gender Eye Color Age Registered Active
"}]},{"codeTitle":"HTML Structure for Search Form and Grid with Natural.js","codeDescription":"Defines the HTML layout for a search form (N.form) and a data grid (N.grid) using Natural.js conventions. It includes buttons for search, add, delete, and save operations, along with a table structure for editable grid rows, demonstrating basic input fields and checkbox for row selection.","codeLanguage":"html","codeTokens":405,"codeId":"https://github.com/bbalganjjm/natural_js/blob/master/docs/DEVELOPER-GUIDE-TEMPLATE-EXAMPLES.md","pageTitle":"Search Form + Grid Example","codeList":[{"language":"html","code":"
